body: OK. Sorry if I sound a bit annoying, but I'm really mad at my brother right now.<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">How do you get an appeal? I really need to appeal my ban because my dumb brother took my account to freaking sing the god dang praises to his other account that he got banned.<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">AND I really want to come back<br id="null"><br id="null">I saw the Appeal sub-topic, but couldn't find an appeal button.<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Thanks.

title: CakeAsylum Question

replies.body: https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50 Go there and then make a new discussion.
replies.body_tagged: https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50 Go there and then make a new discussion.

replies.body:
You have to create a new Discussion (the green button).
Read the stickied topic (https://avicus.net/forums/4f955d6ab).
Copy the format and fill it out.
Now you just have to be patient until a Senior Moderator answers the appeal.
